Introducing Echoes - The Ultimate Cross-LLM Search & Management Extension 🌟
Search, Organize, and Manage Your AI Conversations Across ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini

Echoes transforms how you interact with AI by enabling you to search, organize, and manage conversations from ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini in one streamlined, secure interface. Supporting multiple personal and team workspace accounts, Echoes is essential for handling diverse AI interactions across platforms.

Key Features

Free Features:
🔍 Advanced Search: Search by fuzzy matching, logical operators, stemming, scoring, and exact match. Includes "Did you mean" typo suggestions for improved accuracy.
🔎 Keyword Navigation: Quickly locate keywords within conversations, with an arrow-based menu for seamless navigation.
🏷️ Label Management: Organize up to 5 labels to easily categorize and access related conversations.
✏️ Edit and Delete: Full control over conversation history with direct editing and deletion.
🧭 Effortless Navigation: Navigate conversation history with timestamps for better tracking.
🔗 Chat URL Copy: Quickly share chat links from the context menu.
🌗 Light/Dark Themes: Choose between light and dark themes to suit your style.
🛡️ GDPR-Compliant: Your data is processed locally on your device, ensuring privacy and compliance.
📄 Single LLM Account: Free users can add one LLM account (ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini) to Echoes.

Premium Features (Echoes Plus, Echoes Lifetime Access):
🏷️ Unlimited Labels: Organize conversations with unlimited, hierarchical labels, synced across devices.
🗂️ Cross-LLM Integration: Manage unlimited ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini accounts from one tool.
⭐ Favorites Tags: Mark key conversations as favorites for easy retrieval.
⏲️ Advanced Filters: Filter by label, time, or account type for streamlined organization.
📄 Customizable Summaries: Generate and tailor summaries for each conversation with custom prompts.
📤 Multi-Format Export: Export conversations to JSON, Markdown, or HTML for easy sharing or backup.
🗑️ Bulk Actions & Multi-Select: Select and batch manage conversations to delete, export, favorite, or label.
🎛️ Customization: Customize shortcuts and themes to suit your workflow.
🌐 Full Synchronization: Sync favorites, settings, and labels across devices for a consistent experience.

Why Choose Echoes?

Powerful Labeling System: Organize conversations with unlimited labels and hierarchical structures. Labels help you categorize by project, topic, or custom criteria, simplifying retrieval and management.

Advanced Search Capabilities: Unlike basic search functions, Echoes provides robust, Google-like search:
     - Fuzzy Search: Find results even with typos.
     - Logical Operators: Use AND, OR, NOT to refine results.
     - Stemming & Scoring: Search for word variations and prioritize relevant results.
     - Keyword Navigation: Jump directly to search terms within conversations.

Unified Cross-LLM Management: Handle conversations across ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini from a single, unified dashboard for a streamlined workflow.

Bulk Actions & Optimized Performance: Manage multiple conversations at once with bulk actions like export, delete, or label. Echoes stays fast and responsive even with extensive histories.

Privacy and Security: All data is processed locally on your device, ensuring compliance with GDPR standards and keeping your information secure.
